channel.title: How do i make area, that you have to pay to enter?

please help.

item.title: How do i make area, that you have to pay to enter?
item.dc:creator: @Jagex_Ltd Jagex Ltd©
item.description:
@Jagex_Ltd wrote:

case 1: sendFrame200(4883, 591); sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4884); sendFrame126("Welcome to #######", 4885); sendFrame126("Click here to continue", 4886); sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4883); sendFrame164(4882); NpcDialogueSend = true; if HasItemAmount(995, 500000) { teleportToX = ####; teleportToY = ####; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else { if (995 < 499999) { sendFrame200(4883, 591); sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4884); sendFrame126("You do not have enough cash!", 4885); sendFrame126("Click here to continue", 4886); sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4883); sendFrame164(4882); NpcDialogueSend = true; } break;

Add that with your other dialogues , then search for first click npc
and add this

if (NPCID == ####) { skillX = ProjectLegendX.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX; skillY = ProjectLegendX.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY; NpcWanneTalk = 1; }

EDIT : God , he asked for a npc to be paid to enter;)

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make area, that you have to pay to enter?
item.dc:creator: @God_Tricky God Tricky
item.description:
@God_Tricky wrote:

case 9999: //Pay to go if (playerHasItem(994,500000) { //500k deleteItem(995, 5000000); teleportToX = ABSX; teleportToY = ABSY; } else { if (playerHasItem(994,499000) { sendMessage("Your to poor "+playerName); }

item.title: How do i make area, that you have to pay to enter?
item.dc:creator: @Jagex_Ltd Jagex Ltd©
item.description:
@Jagex_Ltd wrote:

case 9999: // replace 9999 with the id of the object they have to click.
if HasItemAmount(995, #####) { // replace ##### with the amount of cash
deleteItem(995, #####); // replace ##### with the amount of cash
teleportToX = ;//teleportation X coordinates
teleportToY = ;//teleportation Y coordinates
} else { // if they dont have money this happens
if (995 < 2999) { // they dont have enough
disconnected = true; //lol
}

Ok explained all they do , now you should be able to understand.

Read full topic
